original_text: Nebuchadnezzar's men destroyed the Lord's temple with fire. They knocked down the walls around Jerusalem. They burned all the important buildings. They destroyed all the valuable things in the city.
korean_text: 또 하나님의 전을 불사르며 예루살렘 성벽을 헐며 그들의 모든 궁실을 불사르며 그들의 모든 귀한 그릇들을 부수고

sentences.original_text: Nebuchadnezzar's men destroyed the Lord's temple with fire.
sentences.korean_translation: 느부갓네살의 군사들이 불로 주의 성전을 파괴했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They knocked down the walls around Jerusalem.
They burned all the important buildings.
They destroyed all the valuable things in the city.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 도시의 모든 귀중한 것들을 파괴했습니다.
